title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: When modifying the default value of a list box in a report parameter, the new default value is not retained.
EB: When modifying the default value of a list box in a report parameter, the new default value should be retained.
SR:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Locate the list box parameter.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Apply the changes.
5. Verify that the new default value is retained.
